"New training at the White Summit":
"It is tough to make a living... Although I dislike
cold conditions, to ask me to defeat 70 natives
at the White Summit? I think I will freeze...
This is a frozen soil area and it will always be
cold no matter when I go, waiting for the
temperatures to increase is not the way to go
either... I understand there is no choice but to
train, even for a geek it is impossible right?
*Target Natives of Lv.61 and above,
at the White Summit"

"生きてるのがつれーよ……
何がって、スーパーハードのクエストだよ。
オレ寒いの苦手なのに、凍土で原生種を
７０体撃破だぜ？　凍え死ぬかと思ったぜ。
凍土だからいつ行っても寒いし
暖かくなるのを待つワケにもいかねーし……
とりあえず修行するしかねえのはわかるけど
おたくだって無理なモンは無理だよなー？
※凍土エリア限定
Lv.61～の原生種が対象"
